price: 45. Sidaa darteed waa awoodi waayeen inay soo kacaan, isumana gargaari karin.
arabic: فَمَا ٱسۡتَطَٰعُواْ مِن قِيَامٖ وَمَا كَانُواْ مُنتَصِرِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: famā is'taṭāʿū min qiyāmin wamā kānū muntaṣirīna
